title: MBMBaM 542: The Naming of 2021
description:
You were warned that this would be the contents of this episode, and we ALWAYS follow through on our threats. Join us as we choose a mantra and a direction for the new calendar year, and then at the last second throw that mantra and direction in the toilet in exchange for a new one that doesn’t make any sense in the slightest.    

Ways to support Black Lives Matter and find anti-racism resources: https://linktr.ee/blacklivesmatter
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Travis McElroy, Justin McElroy, Griffin McElroy)
